casebody.data:
MASTERPIECE CAKESHOP, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
COLORADO CIVIL RIGHTS COMMISSION, et al. No. 16-111. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 21, 2017.

Joint motion of respondents for divided argument granted. Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral *467argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
